name: .System_Error.
description:
Synopsis

Bilbo is an antivirus who lives in a pen drive. When connected to a computer, he will have to take action and fight malware (worms, Trojans, Spyware, randware, etc.) and manage to restart the computer in order to make it work again and make disappear the frightening ".System_ERROR." message. 

What is .System_Error?

.System_Error. is an original platform game, set in an industrial science fiction world, in which the final battle against the Trojan horse will take place  before the computer could be restarted.

Do you accept the challenge to free your PC from the Trojan malware?
